adjustLocationByDxDy() - Method in class simzombie.engine.Agent
Adjusts the location of the agent by dx and dy, if it is allowed to move This method can be called alone to guarantee movement, or used in conjuction with the Environment class which puts some extra restrictions on movement

AgentType - Class in simzombie.engine
A storage class that holds information about the typings of agents AgentTypes are assigned unique identifiers when created, so each simulation will have their own unique collection of AgentTypes.
